00025  * @brief  General purpose exception for error handling.

00028 #ifndef EXCEPT_H
00029 #define EXCEPT_H
00030 
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include<stdexcept>
00033 #include<string>
00034 //
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * @brief General purpose exception error for error handling.
00038  */
00039 class Except : public std::exception {
00040 
00041 public:
00042   /** 
00043    * @brief Constructor.
00044    * @param msg Message for the user/programmer.
00045    */
00046   Except(const std::string &msg) : m_Msg(msg) {}
00047 
00048   /** 
00049    * @brief virtual destructor for a base class.
00050    * @return 
00051    */
00052   virtual ~Except() throw() {}
00053 
00054   /** 
00055    * @brief Standard what() call, just returns error message. 
00056    * @return error message.
00057    */
00058   virtual const char* what() const throw() {
00059     return m_Msg.c_str();
00060   }
00061 
00062 private:
00063   /// Our error message.
00064   std::string m_Msg;
00065 };
00066 
00067 #endif /* EXCEPT_H */
